The '''MCC 15th Year Cape''' is a [[cape]] which was obtainable by completing all 15 challenges in the [[MCC x Minecraft 15th Anniversary Party]].

== Appearance ==
The cape's design include a golden crown and large, white lettering of the number fifteen. It's placed on a red background with additional golden frills at the bottom and top.

== Distribution ==
{{Main|MCC x Minecraft 15th Anniversary Party#Challenges|title1=MCC x Minecraft 15th Anniversary Party}}The MCC 15th Year cape was obtained by completing all 15 challenges in the [[MCC x Minecraft 15th Anniversary Party]] event sever.
